column1: If you have examples of voter fraud or irregularities please report them right away. I’d also encourage you to report any instances to law enforcement in your state. https://t.co/UyjS7ACyc4

I support President @realDonaldTrump’s efforts to ensure we have a fair and accurate account of the votes. I encourage all Americans to remain patient as we go through the legal process to ensure the validity of the election.
Congratulations @CarlForAlabama on the big victory tonight! I look forward to working with you to make as smooth a transition as possible. The people of Southwest Alabama are in good hands!

For voters in Baldwin County I also encourage you to support local Amendment 2. This conservative pro-growth amendment will allow us to extend the Baldwin Beach Express all the way to I-65. More: https://t.co/fiW5QeIjkd

There is a lot at stake in next Tuesday’s #AL01 runoff. These are difficult times for our country and we need strong leaders with a backbone who will always put Alabama and our conservative values first. That’s why I’m supporting Jerry Carl (@CarlForAlabama).

Talking with Sean Sullivan on @fmtalk1065 right now about why I’m voting for @CarlForAlabama and a number of other important issues facing our state and country.

I’m honored to endorse and support my friend Jerry Carl (@CarlForAlabama) to be the next Congressman for Southwest Alabama. Jerry is a strong conservative with a backbone who will stand up to special interests and put Alabama first. Join me in voting for Jerry on July 14th! #AL01
